summary: Header logo sizing and SVG usage appear to have been updated in `Header.tsx` to meet the requested responsive heights with preserved aspect ratio. Some additional non-requested metadata/summary files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state tracking file (`project_state.json`) even though the BuildRequest only asked for header logo size/alignment changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints focus on React+Tailwind header logo rendering; no requirement mentions updating project state metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, including summaries referencing unrelated features/pages (e.g., privacy/terms/refund routes, redesigned home/hero components).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to header logo size/alignment and SVG usage; updating a broad frontend summary file (and referencing unrelated features) was not requested.
